stimulusHtml: Which of the following changes can be made so the method returns the intended value?

features.html:
The following method is intended to return an array with the values of the parameter  letters  in reverse order. The method does not work as intended.

 

public static String[] reverseArray(String[] letters) 
{ 
   String[] revLetters = new String[letters.length];  // Line 3 
   for (int x = 0; x < letters.length; x++)           // Line 4
   { 
      revLetters[x] = letters[letters.length - x];    // Line 6 
   }
   return revLetters;
}

choicesHtml: Changing line 3 to  String[] revLetters = new String[letters.length - 1];
Changing line 4 to  for (int x = 0; x < letters.length - 1; x++)
Changing line 6 to  revLetters[x] = letters[letters.length - x - 1];
Changing line 6 to  letters[x] = revLetters[letters.length - x];
